title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 379.85 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 1.66 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2024.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2016.
